data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Labuan.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Labuan, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 86,900 citizens of Labuan, Malaysia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Labuan, Malaysia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 3,058 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Penan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Labuan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Labuan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Labuan, Malaysia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Labuan
location.people_groups_list: Pashtun, Northern, Kensiu, Orang Kanaq, Mah Meri, Besisi, Mamak, Talang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pashtun, Northern (6,000), Kensiu (300), Orang Kanaq (200), Mah Meri, Besisi (4,000), Mamak, Talang (125,000)
